## Extension.Name type

Registered extension names

Signature:

```typescript
export declare type Name = `${
  | (keyof Modules & string)
  | (keyof Plugins & string)}`;
```

References: [Modules](/api/bud-framework/modules), [Plugins](//bud-framework/plugins)

## Remarks

Extension names can be declared by overloading the [Modules](/api/bud-framework/modules) and [Plugins](//bud-framework/plugins) interfaces
